text: What does your card look like? what components are you using

Just a form and button component (buttonA), and I’m hoping to replace the two with a button component (buttonB).

Basically, the onClick of buttonA is what I’m hoping will trigger the re-render and replace both the form and buttonA with buttonB.
Yeah currently forms are having a really hard time rerendering see the link I posted above
Ah. Sorry. Now I’m seeing what you’re saying. So re-rendering is possible, just not when form components are involve, basically? Reading the post now.
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> said they would have a fix out "tentatively next month" 3 weeks ago so hopefully we'll have a fix soon. Definitely a real problem
